channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Tiny Homes
channel.desc: Welcome to Tiny Homes. Where we explore the tiny houses, boats and motors that people call home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Grand Designs New Zealand
channel.desc: Swedish architect Josefine Watterson is building a passive house in Featherston to achieve Certified Passive House Designer status, featuring triple-glazed windows and Adobo cladding.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Best of The Gardener
channel.desc: Tanya shows you how to prep garden beds, grow your own seedlings, and create and maintain perfect hedges.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Scott's Vacation House Rules
channel.desc: In every episode Scott McGillivray helps make homeowner's dreams come true by unlocking the hidden potential in their dated, uninspired vacation property.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Creative Living
channel.desc: The final stage of the total renovation is to solve the access issues that even stopped trick or treaters from knocking on Jo and Richard's front door.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Your Home, Made Perfect UK
channel.desc: Two ingenious designs come to life using virtual reality, helping a conflicting couple from Kent realise their dream home.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Luxury Listings
channel.desc: Discover tips for healthy aging, longevity, and vitality, plus how aesthetic medicine can help reverse visible signs of aging-even after extreme weight loss.

channel.title: Jamie's Easy Meals for Everyday
channel.desc: A creamy cauliflower-cheese pasta goes head-to-head with a lighter, simpler take on classic chicken Kiev.

channel.title: Rochelle Humes...
channel.desc: S1/E5'. can Rochelle help Gavin and Shelley transform his childhood home into a modernised live-work family space.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: AfriMaxx
channel.desc: Afrimaxx is a lifestyle show which searches for inspiration and innovation in all areas of popular culture - from fashion and design through to architecture, art, food and travel.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Open Homes
channel.desc: James is in an architectural home in Sydney that has layers, a sustainable home with all the hidden features and Dave takes us into his latest and greatest landscape.

channel.title: Real Health
channel.desc: We look at Sexual Dysfunction in men. We find out how a Biokineticist helps improve physical functioning and quality of life. We explore the importance of vitamin B12.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Home Rescue
channel.desc: Over the last ten years as Dolores's three children have moved out, she has moved more and more clutter in! The house is now at bursting point with clothes, shoes and paraphernalia for community events.

channel.title: Tom Kerridge Sunday Lunch
